Welcome to TermuxPinger!

To use this app, please ensure the following prerequisites are met:

1. Termux app is installed on your device (Github version is better than Play Store version).

2. Your app has the following permissions:
- com.termux.permission.RUN_COMMAND

3. Termux app has access to:
- Files and Storage
- Notifications
- Draw over other apps (SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW)
- Battery optimizations disabled

4. Termux has allow-external-apps enabled:
- edit the file ~/.termux/termux.properties from within termux and set allow-external-apps to true (it is usualy commented out)
